meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a lion.
meanings.sent1: The fierce roar of the lionlike creature echoed through the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The lionlike statue stood proudly at the entrance of the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The lionlike toy seemed to come to life as it roared playfully.
meanings.sent4: Her lionlike courage in the face of danger inspired everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The lionlike mane of the majestic creature shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics associated with a lion.
meanings.sent1: The lionlike hunter stealthily stalked its prey through the tall grass.
meanings.sent2: His lionlike strength helped him protect his family from any danger.
meanings.sent3: The lionlike determination in her eyes showed she would never give up.
meanings.sent4: The team's lionlike spirit led them to victory in the championship.
meanings.sent5: The lionlike grace with which she moved captivated all who watched.
